title: Enhancing Practical App Development Competencies: Delphi Framework-Based Health Information Literacy Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can apply a 4-step verification framework to assess the credibility of health information
Learners can generate visualization materials combining public datasets with personal health information
Learners can identify health-related misinformation in digital environments and develop response strategies
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
